name: Rocks in Space
description:
This is just an asteroids clone but with my own spin to it, also this is my attempt at learning to make games. so feedback would be great.

How to Play:

The game is automatically set to the arrow keys to move, but there is an option to change it to the (wasd) keys.

(Space) is to Shoot.

(Z or M) to use special (depending on the settings)
